description:
Anthony's back and he's just as hot as he was before.

This big dicked 23 year old is here to show off what makes him such a stud, to make a bit of money, and of course, to get off.

For this hard-on producing scene, Anthony will be enjoying himself on the sofa before heading for the bed for the finale.

This hunk has it all, the body, the smile and the cock. We sure love having him in front of the camera, and from what you all have told us, you do too.

Enjoy!
title: Anthony
